code: export var RESET_TEXT_CHOICES='RESET_TEXT_CHOICES';export var SET_TEXT='SET_TEXT';export var SET_CHOICES='SET_CHOICES';export var RESET_TEXT_UPDATE='RESET_TEXT_UPDATE';export var resetTextChoices=function resetTextChoices(){return{type:RESET_TEXT_CHOICES};};export var setText=function setText(text){return{type:SET_TEXT,text:text};};export var setChoices=function setChoices(choices){return{type:SET_CHOICES,choices:choices};};export var resetTextUpdate=function resetTextUpdate(){return{type:RESET_TEXT_UPDATE};};
